frameset.edef: to subscribe, join, become an active participant

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (ADVP (ADV هكذا)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينخرط) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-MNR (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC سرا)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN صفوف) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المقاومة)))))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تكون) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC نهايت) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN زوج) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN اسحق)))) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC معا)))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: In the ranks of the resistance
